IterationTooltip: Allows to define the retention rules for the iterations of the Physical Representations
IterationIntro: Allows to define the retention rules for the iterations of the Physical Representations
ObjectIdentifierTooltip: Allows to define naming rules for each content type
VersionNamingTooltip: Allows to define how object revisions will be named depending on the object type
DataAccessRightTooltip: Allows to define the rules on who can access what content
EngineeringCentralTooltip: Defines promotion rules for Engineering Parts
DeploymentTooltip: Import and Export Configuration, Server Utilities, Download CATNLS ...
EngineeringWorkspaceTooltip: Allows to define rules to customize Engineering Workspace behavior
CollabServicesTooltip: Allows to customize the Collab Services commands access according to the Access Roles
ExchangeServicesTooltip: Allows to configure access to Exchange Tools according to roles.
XCADParameterizationTooltip: Define Attribute mapping between CAD and PLM data
EventMessagingTooltip: Allows messages to be sent to the Message Bus whenever some events occur in 3DSpace applications
DerivedFormatConversionServicesTooltip: Allow to format Derived Format Generation Criteria
XENManagementTooltip: Allows to define rules to configure Engineering Definition behavior
DownloadTooltip: Download NLS Files to deploy on local installs
IndexationTxt: Update Index Model with Added or Removed Attributes
IndexationTooltip: The updated index model makes new (or removed) fields available (or not) to 3DSearch. When content is added to the new attributes, the 3DSpace index is updated automatically
IndexationInfo: The indexation process will take several minutes to complete, please make sure to wait enough before using the new indexed content

ReloadCacheSuccessMsg: 3DSpace Server Cache has been successfully reloaded
ImportSuccessMsg: Configuration file has been Successfully Imported
ExportXMLWarning: The exported XML file should never be modified manually. Modifying such file and importing it may cause unexpected behavior !

NotSelectedMsg: No file is selected, please choose an XML one
ImportFileTooltip: Imports XML Configuration file from other servers. You can choose to import the configuration and apply it immediately, or you can choose to import only, so that you can review and tune the settings before applying them.

ImportApplytooltip: Import and directly Apply XML Settings file

ExportTooltip: Export Configuration into an XML File

partSameSequence: Development and Production Parts cannot have the same versioning sequence, the Other Naming Sequence was changed as well!
cloudSequenceChange: Setting(s) successfully applied to all engineering content.

confirmResetMsg: Are you sure that you want to reset the settings ?
Not_IntegerMsg: The current entry is not an integer! Please change it

DimensionsToolTip: Dimensions are activated only for attributes of type Real.

ExportIn3DXMLToolTip: 3DXML Export/Import is only available in Win Apps
ResetOnDuplicateToolTip: When selected, the attribute must be reset when the object containing it is cloned.
ResetOnRevisionToolTip: When selected, the attribute must be reset when a new version of the object is done.
AuthorizedValuesTooltip: Authorized values must be separated by commas and contain the default value
AttributeIndexedTooltip: When selected, enables indexing for full-text search on this attribute
ReadOnlyAttrTooltip: When selected, the attribute's value can only be entered using an external app (based on CAA/Automation programming) and not by a native or web app user
